SimpleAI Class¶

class api.simple_ai.SimpleAI(game: ChessGame)¶

Implements an easy computer AI to play against the user

get_next_move() → tuple¶

AI will brute force all valid moves and choose the one with the biggest value from get_value() :return: A four tuple indicates AI’s move

get_value(board: list) → float¶
Parameters

board – A 8*8 2d array that records a game board

Returns

A float represents the value of current game state, AI uses this value to decide which move to place.
